attributes.action: Give the town of Wootton Bassett the new name of ROYAL WOOTTON BASSETT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of Wootton Bassett have long supported the repatriation of our fallen armed forces from war zones.
They line the main street as the vehicles bearing the coffins of these men and women time after time and deserve recognition of a more substantial type.
Renaming Wootton Bassett as Royal Wootton Bassett would go some way to awarding this recognition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
